DataElement.preferredName: Basic Local Alignment Search Tool Input Programming Parameter Filter Flag java.lang.Boolean
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A sequence search method designed to find regions of similarity between biological sequences.:Anything added into a sytem.:A value that is passed to a routine._A higher-order function which takes a predicate and a list and returns those elements of the list for which the predicate is true. It is a means of narrowing the scope of a report by specifying ranges or types of data to include or exclude.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true._Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

Property.preferredDefinition: A higher-order function which takes a predicate and a list and returns those elements of the list for which the predicate is true. Concepts.definition: A higher-order function which takes a predicate and a list and returns those elements of the list for which the predicate is true. It is a means of narrowing the scope of a report by specifying ranges or types of data to include or exclude.
An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
